availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
State of Ohio
City of Cincinnati } SS:

Charles H. Fox, appointed a Commissioner of Deeds, &c. for the State of Kentucky, under Chapter 70, Act of General Assembly of said state, approved January 7th, 1852, by Commission dated October 2d, 1865, being duly sworn, makes oath and says, that he will well and truly execute and perform all the duties of his said office.
Sworn to and subscribed before me, a Commissioner of the State of Kentucky, for the State of Ohio, duly commissioned and authorized to take affidavit &c this 3rd day of october, 1865.
Witness my hand and official seal, the day and year aforesaid.

Saml S. Carpenter
Commissioner for Kentucky in Ohio.

Comr of Deeds
Ohio
Oath of Chas H. Fox
filed 5th Oct 1864
